name: Soul of the Beast
description:
Legacy of the Beast is a work in progress unofficial demake of the Amiga classic Shadow of the Beast, developed by Reflections and published by Psygnosis in 1989.
Written entirely in 6502 Assembly, it is an Atari 2600 conversion intended to be as faithful to the original as technically possible for a system originally released in 1977.
Play the entire Forest staring area in this ALPHA DEMO !
Standard 4K, NTSC
More about the original Shadow of the Beast and its other versions can be found here: https://beast-41f50f.webflow.io
If you are interested in learning how to develop for the Atari system, check out www.pikuma.com and www.8bitworkshop.com
